wikipedia_page.main: David Andrew Coles (born 15 June 1964) is an English goalkeeping coach and former professional footballer. As a player, he made nearly 200 appearances in the Football League. He was appointed goalkeeping coach of Indian Super League club Mumbai City in 2021.

response: * David Coles (footballer) (born 1964), English football goalkeeping coach
* David Coles (author), science fiction writer featured in New Writings in SF 19
* David Coles (bishop) (born 1943), Anglican bishop in New Zealand
* David Coles (radio host), former host of the radio show Variety Tonight
* David Coles, a Canadian hip hop musician, with stage name Kyprios
* John David Coles, American film and television director
